A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Unfortunately\, despite the strong acting of the lead stars as well as the supporting cast\, the poor storytelling and lack of vison makes this the worst entry in the sequel trilogy. Rian Johnson wanted to subvert and throw expectations and fan theories but he also threw a new track in plot with having Snoke killed and having Rey written as a nobody. May we never see Johnson's involvement in the Star Wars franchise ever again.
